sentence: The room was superior in decor amenities and the best part was the ocean view and the Jacuzi
We booked the Royal Service and it was well worth the additional costs having your own butler and access to the adults only section and pool was great
I really liked the ocean view the pools were clean I liked that there was professional nightly entertainment not enough seats were provided
Good nice looking resort Bad extremely cold pools nobody even uses them
The servers at the pool area were awesome as well and made sure that if I needed anything they were there to supply our needs
We enjoyed our breakfast overlooking the pool and with a view of the beach also
There were Procter entrances and pool beach areas
Bali beds on the beach at polside being catered to your every whim
The food was good the beach and the pool area was nice and relaxing
It had it is own pool area along with a dedicated person to serve you food and drinks while on the beach
You are guaranteed 2 Bali beds around the pool in royal service we asked every day and in some cases gave 48 hours and heard nothing
We liked all the activities by the pool
Beach is beautiful but while we stayed there was red flag so we could not swim
Once it stopped raining we enjoyed the Bali beds we walked along the ocean and we got in the pool
The pools were clean however we stayed out of the kidie pools as they were crowded and not too appealing for us
They also have a place near the pool that serves some hamburgers hot dogs wings sandwiches and salads
My husband went to swim in the pool before it opened officially and had no issues
The pools were nice but I do think one of the major let downs is the fact they are all deep with none less than 5 ft 4 except the infants pool
The beach and pool were nice but crowded in the early afternoons
The Royal Service pool and portion of the beach was where we mainly spent our time
We spent most of our time with our wedding guests in the main pool area since all the action would be there anyway
We did Zumba every morning and played all of the games by the pool
Since we were only there for 4 days we just lounged by the pool everyday
In Paradisus Cancun you will not have a separate pool beach or restaurant just for FC guests
Few things to know do not sit near DJ stand by pool
Grab a chair by the pool early let them do the rest
It was difficult to get places not all floors connect to other wings and to go to the pool we would first have to pass by it then go down a floor and then we could go back in the direction of it
there is also a tiny round kids pool that looked sketchy we stayed away
The pool grill by the pool was just okay as well as the Enso Asian cuisine
The pool waiters are great and work really hard
